siteMetadata.title: csnotehub
siteMetadata.subtitle: Tips for CS, IT, and CpE university students!

frontmatter.title: Constructors
frontmatter.description: Constructors are a special type of method in a class. A constructor is defined by declaring a function (a method) inside our class with the same name as the class

frontmatter.title: Classes and Objects
frontmatter.description: Classes serve as templates to objects in your program. Classes and objects are the first concepts you need to understand for Object Oriented Programming (OOP). Variables inside classes are called attributes, while functions inside classes are called methods.
